ygData.subject: The benefits of helping others
ygData.msgSnippet: I bask in the glow of attaining my first Lambent item, the Lambent Greaves! I ve been accumulating pieces for my Lambent Armor now for a few days and have
ygData.messageBody:
I bask in the glow of attaining my first Lambent item, the Lambent Greaves!

I've been accumulating pieces for my Lambent Armor now for a few days and
have TWICE now had 50th level casters that I didn't know be very friendly
and follow me around for an hour or so helping me get pieces. Why? Because
for no reason and without payment I had stopped and healed their low level
secondary characters up, or had bailed them out of sticky situations with
orcs or something.

Here's me getting my Icy Greaves item:

You say 'Hail an Elite Goblin'
Alanya begins to cast a spell.
A Elite Goblin was hit for 985 points of damage by Alanya!!
A Elite Goblin has been slain by Alanya.
You say 'Damn, girl. Ice Comet?'
Alanya says 'Yeppers - go loot it.'


Crier Sharpsong
